formattedAddress: 348 E 49th St, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 348 E 49th St, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text: HIGHLY RECOMMEND. Miguel’s was recommended to me by a friend who lives in the area.  I had a favorite pair of loafers about 20 years old with a couple holes/tears. I thought they were probably beyond repair but because I loved the style and fit, I wanted to see if they could be salvaged.  Miguel’s did an OUTSTANDING job and breathed new life into these old favorites that were about to be discarded. I live in Brooklyn Heights and it was worth the trip (an easy walk from Grand Central).  This is a little gem of a place -- staff was extremely professional and courteous.  Price was EXCELLENT value. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: They wanted to charge me 120dollars for changing a zipper. Good luck running your business if it's more profitable buying new shoes. Unbelievable.

text.text: They wanted to charge me 120dollars for changing a zipper. Good luck running your business if it's more profitable buying new shoes. Unbelievable.

originalText.text: BEWARE The biggest mistake I ever made taking my Louis Vuitton to this horrible woman not only did she not clean my bag but I believe she switched it out for a fake Louis Vuitton it doesn't feel like my bag it doesn't even look like my bag anymore I had a beautiful $3600 Louis Vuitton bag which now has no Stiffness to it at all it lost its shape and it was given back to me in worse condition than when I gave it to her
